body.name: My Arcade Atari Micro Player Pro: 100 Games, 6.75" Mini Arcade Machine, Fully playable Video Game Collectible
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 11 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Officially licensed Atari titles. 100 Games in 1. Titles include Asteroids, Centipede, Millipede, Breakout, Missile Command, Tempest and many more.
Full color 2.75" screen. Built-in speaker with volume control
3.5 mm headphone port to connect your headphones
Powered by either 4 AA batteries (not included) or by a USB-C cable (not included)
Perfect for any game room, office or display case
body.description: Atari is a pioneer in the video game industry, responsible for some of the most iconic games of all time, including Pong®, Breakout®, and Asteroids®. Atari® was founded in 1972 and, with a rich history that spans over 50 years, is one of the oldest video game companies in the world. With its focus on innovative gameplay and cutting-edge technology, Atari® has always been at the forefront of the gaming industry.

reviews.reviewText: We bought 2 for our nieces for Xmas - they loved them!!! Worth every penny...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: All 2600. No arcade versions. No surround golf football Atari space invaders battlezone.Extra games a couple of decent shooters but nothing great.Battery door has a microscopic Phillips screw. Had to break it open. No major damage.ALERT! If you started collecting these games when they first came out. The batteries in mine are starting to go bad. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome device for Atari Enthusiasts
reviews.reviewText: Buttons feel nice doesn't feel cheap, these are just nice little handhelds for the money! I have several my arcade mini arcades now. Even the big Data East one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Awesome little Atari arcade machine that runs well. There's an option for 3 different backlight settings which I found convenient for saving battery. The speakers are powerful, and the LCD is bright and crisp. The game selection is also incredible. Some of my favorites are Saboteur and Quadrun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product not great amazon packing employee
reviews.reviewText: I love the myarcade machines. Now for the amazon packaging. That is a joke. Lets put a 40.00 machine in a poly bag for shipping through the postal service so the box window which is 3/4 of the box is damaged on both sides. Maybe you should retain that worker for being so lazy. myarcade i would get a 5 out of 5 and amazon a -1 out of 5 for failure to package safely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Bad screens on Micro Player Pros
reviews.reviewText: The screens on these micro player pros are bad and scratch SUPER easy....doesn't matter how new or delicate your microfiber cloths are these screens are terrible. I've gone through 2 atari micro players and my Megaman looks pretty rough already and it's not a week old so it's consistent across all of them pretty much. Not worth the $40 and is disappointing since the older batch of Micro Players do not have this screen issue. Save your money
Exactly what I expected! High quality, heavy plastic, officially licensed

reviews.reviewTitle: My Arcade still needs to improve quite a lot...
reviews.reviewText: No way, this handheld is cute and the Atari inspired design on a custom cabinet is also really nice. The pros end here. The plastics are cheap (the buttons are cheap also), the stickers on the cabinet are badly placed, that control stick is irritating due to its bad quality when it comes about controlling the games, all paddle games are unplayable due to the lack of a paddle controller of course, the emulation is under the standard (Missile Command is slower than usual and some games have serious emulation issues) and this is INEXCUSABLE for a product like this in 202x. Plus, the "bonus games" are nothing more than NES games licensed by PIko: c'mon, this is an Atari product! THIS PRODUCT FEATURES AN ATARI LICENSE SO IT MUST FEATURE ATARI GAMES, NOT NINTENDO GAMES. Why not 7800 or Arcade games, instead than uninspired or even bad NES games? What a disgusting way to ruin a celebrative product like this. No way, My Arcade! I sent it back, of course.Judging from what products we will get in 2024, My Arcade will produce Atari Super and Mega Player, both bigger and with a joystick, a spinner, a paddle and even a keypad mounted on them: so, what's the reason for choosing this, when the other option provides a product (ok, we have to wait a little for now, but...that's the truth in every case) that will get all the features that are needed for playing these games in the way how they should be played? In that case, I hope for My Arcade that they will resolve all the emulation issues. Totally disappointed.

reviews.reviewTitle: el producto ha llegado bien pero la caja estaba rota y es algo que tiene su valor.
reviews.reviewText: el producto ha llegado bien pero la caja estaba rota y es algo que tiene su valor. Y se nota que metieron la caja ya rota dentro de la caja de reparto de amazon.Este es uno de los motivos por los que conviene pensar dos veces antes de comprar en amazon. Yo nunca escogeria un producto con la caja rota en una tienda fisica y amazon deberia exigir lo mismo a los vendedores

reviews.reviewTitle: Cute for display on a shelf.
reviews.reviewText: Does what the advertising says. The screen and controls are decent but not stellar. The quality of the case and artwork _is_ very nice.One of these units looks great on your col!section shelf for display. Will you actually play it much? Not too likely as it is small and awkward.
Brilliant product! Well made! Great quality! Excellent game options! Highly recommend!
